organizations.description: The list of Azure DevOps organizations the pool should be present in.

permissionProfile.description: The type of permission which determines which accounts are admins on the Azure DevOps pool.

AzureDevOpsPermissionProfile.description: Defines the type of Azure DevOps pool permission.

kind.description: Determines who has admin permissions to the Azure DevOps pool.

AzureDevOpsPermissionType.description: Determines who has admin permissions to the Azure DevOps pool.

values.name: Inherit
values.description: Pool will inherit permissions from the project or organization.

values.name: CreatorOnly
values.description: Only the pool creator will be an admin of the pool.

values.name: SpecificAccounts
values.description: Only the specified accounts will be admins of the pool.

CachingType.description: The type of caching in a data disk.

values.name: None
values.description: Don't use host caching.

values.name: ReadOnly
values.description: For workloads that only do read operations.

values.name: ReadWrite
values.description: For workloads that do a balance of read and write operations.

DataDisk.description: The data disk of the VMSS.

caching.description: The type of caching to be enabled for the data disks. The default value for caching is readwrite. For information about the caching options see: https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsazurestorage/2012/06/27/exploring-windows-azure-drives-disks-and-images/.

diskSizeGiB.description: The initial disk size in gigabytes.

storageAccountType.description: The storage Account type to be used for the data disk. If omitted, the default is "standard_lrs".

driveLetter.description: The drive letter for the empty data disk. If not specified, it will be the first available letter.

DevOpsAzureSku.description: The Azure SKU of the machines in the pool.

name.description: The Azure SKU name of the machines in the pool.

values.name: Balanced
values.description: Balance between cost and performance.

values.name: MostCostEffective
values.description: Optimizes for cost over performance.

values.name: MoreCostEffective
values.description: Halfway through cost and balanced.

values.name: MorePerformance
values.description: Halfway through balanced and performance.

values.name: BestPerformance
values.description: Optimizes for performance over cost.

ResourceSkuLocationInfo.description: Describes an available Compute SKU Location Information.

zones.description: List of availability zones where the SKU is supported.

zoneDetails.description: Gets details of capabilities available to a SKU in specific zones.

resourceType.description: The type of resource the SKU applies to.

tier.description: The tier of virtual machines in a scale set

locations.description: The set of locations that the SKU is available.

locationInfo.description: A list of locations and availability zones in those locations where the SKU is available

capabilities.description: Name value pairs to describe the capability.

ResourceSkuRestrictionInfo.description: Describes an available Compute SKU Restriction Information.

locations.description: Locations where the SKU is restricted

zones.description: List of availability zones where the SKU is restricted.

values.description: The value of restrictions. If the restriction type is set to location. This would be different locations where the SKU is restricted.

restrictionInfo.description: The information about the restriction where the SKU cannot be used.

ResourceSkuZoneDetails.description: Describes The zonal capabilities of a SKU.

name.description: Gets the set of zones that the SKU is available in with the specified capabilities.

capabilities.description: A list of capabilities that are available for the SKU in the specified list of zones.

ResourceStatus.description: The status of the machine resource.

values.name: Ready
values.description: Represents a machine resource that is ready.

values.name: NotReady
values.description: Represents a machine resource that is not ready.

values.name: Allocated
values.description: Represents a machine resource that is allocated.

values.name: PendingReturn
values.description: Represents a machine resource that is pending return.

values.name: Returned
values.description: Represents a machine resource that is returned.

values.name: Leased
values.description: Represents a machine resource that is leased.

values.name: Provisioning
values.description: Represents a machine resource that is provisioning.

values.name: Updating
values.description: Represents a machine resource that is updating.

values.name: Starting
values.description: Represents a machine resource that is starting.

values.name: PendingReimage
values.description: Represents a machine resource that is pending reimage.

values.name: Reimaging
values.description: Represents a machine resource that is reimaging.

SecretsManagementSettings.description: The secret management settings of the machines in the pool.

certificateStoreLocation.description: Where to store certificates on the machine.

observedCertificates.description: The list of certificates to install on all machines in the pool.

keyExportable.description: Defines if the key of the certificates should be exportable.

Stateful.description: Stateful profile meaning that the machines will be returned to the pool after running a job.

maxAgentLifetime.description: How long should stateful machines be kept around. The maximum is one week.

gracePeriodTimeSpan.description: How long should the machine be kept around after it ran a workload when there are no stand-by agents. The maximum is one week.

StatefulUpdate.description: Stateful profile meaning that the machines will be returned to the pool after running a job.

maxAgentLifetime.description: How long should stateful machines be kept around. The maximum is one week.

gracePeriodTimeSpan.description: How long should the machine be kept around after it ran a workload when there are no stand-by agents. The maximum is one week.

StatelessAgentProfile.description: Stateless profile meaning that the machines will be cleaned up after running a job.

StatelessAgentProfileUpdate.description: Stateless profile meaning that the machines will be cleaned up after running a job.

values.name: StandardLRS
values.description: The data disk should use standard locally redundant storage.

values.name: PremiumLRS
values.description: The data disk should use premium locally redundant storage.

values.name: StandardSSDLRS
values.description: The data disk should use standard SSD locally redundant storage.

values.name: PremiumZRS
values.description: The data disk should use premium SSD zonal redundant storage.

values.name: StandardSSDZRS
values.description: The data disk should use standard SSD zonal redundant storage.

StorageProfile.description: The storage profile of the VMSS.

osDiskStorageAccountType.description: The Azure SKU name of the machines in the pool.

dataDisks.description: A list of empty data disks to attach.

sku.description: The Azure SKU of the machines in the pool.

images.description: The VM images of the machines in the pool.

osProfile.description: The OS profile of the machines in the pool.

storageProfile.description: The storage profile of the machines in the pool.

networkProfile.description: The network profile of the machines in the pool.
